mapper.select: select B.*, M.mem_nick from review_blind B inner join review R on B.review_no = R.review_no left outer join mem M on R.mem_no = M.mem_no where review_isblind = '1' order by review_blind_no desc

select R.*, M.mem_nick from review_report R left outer join mem M on R.mem_no = M.mem_no where review_no = #{reviewNo} and review_report_time >= to_timestamp('#{reportStartTime}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3') order by review_report_no asc
mapper.update: update review_blind set review_isblind = '2', blind_clear_time = sysdate where review_no = #{reviewNo} and review_isblind = '1'
